title: Let's Play Gang Beasts Soccer with Tim Schafer - Kinda Funny Plays E3 2016
description:
Subscribe for all your E3 2016 updates! https://www.youtube.com/c/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Greg, Tim, and Nick played Gang Beasts new soccer mode with Tim Shafer himself!

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
